978422312.name: Tarragon Chicken With Peas
978422312.instructions:
1. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and add olive oil.
  2. Season the chicken liberally with salt and pepper, then sear until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
  3. Combine chicken stock and cream and add to chicken, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan.
  4. Bring to a boil, and then reduce to simmer and cook until chicken is cooked through and sauce is thickened, about 5-10 minutes.
  5. Gently stir in tarragon and peas, cover, and cook for 1 minute to heat up peas.
  6. Season with salt and pepper and serve sliced chicken over rice for an easy and elegant entre.

1273456958.name: Broccoli and Chickpea Rice Salad
ingredients: 1/4 cup sliced almonds (lightly toasted if desired)
2 cups cooked brown rice (2/3 cup dried rice)
1/4 cup fresh cilantro or parsley, trimmed and chopped
2 to 3 green onions, trimmed and chopped, or 2 shallots finely chopped
2 tablespoons pineapple juice (juice from canned pineapple)
1 1/2 teaspoons sea salt, or to taste
1/3 cup sun-dried tomatoes, soaked in hot water for 40 minutes, drained and chopped (optional)
1273456958.instructions: In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the broccoli, stir well, and cover. Cook, stirring often, until the broccoli is tender. Add the broccoli to a large bowl, along with the remaining salad ingredients.To make the dressing, whisk together all of the dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to coat evenly. Taste for seasoning and serve.

980511066.name: Perfect Peas
ingredients: 1 pound bag of frozen peas, steamed
980511066.instructions:
1. In a small bowl, mix butter, herbs, lemon juice, and parmesan cheese.
  2. Melt mixture over cooked peas and serve.
